statements: DELETE FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_id = 100 AND payment_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 5000 AND policy_id IN (SELECT policy_id FROM Policies WHERE insurance_type = 'Life');
DELETE FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE policy_number = 500 AND renewal_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_id = 100 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE policy_number = 500 AND renewal_date > '2022-06-15';
DELETE FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE policy_id = 10 AND status = 'Active';
